name: Warp Tag
description:
In this game, a younger brother wants to spend time with his brother, who happens to be a very busy wizard-in-training.  Though the wizard wants to be left alone, he's drawn to play with his brother, even if only subconsciously. In the end, they love each other, but life has gotten in the way of their closeness.

Regardless of the 'deep' intentions, this is meant to be a simple and enjoyable game. 

This game was created as part of Trijam #152: The 3 hour game jam, and all build was completed in approximately three hours (give or take a few minutes!).

Controls and info:

  • WASD or Arrowkeys to move.
  • Gray squares (will be an hourglass) increase the time.
  • Yellow squares (will be a feather) increase the player's speed

The build and design for the game can be found on my GitHub.
